item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Winamp Legacy player source code is now open (141 points | 49 comments)
2. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (211 points | 55 comments)
3. Move Fast and Abandon Things (102 points | 21 comments)
4. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (68 points | 22 comments)
5. Evan Prodromou Launches the Social Web Foundation (41 points | 4 comments)
6. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (91 points | 24 comments)
7. Finish Your Projects (41 points | 19 comments)
8. The Quest to Build a Telescope on the Moon (50 points | 26 comments)
9. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (33 points | 13 comments)
10. Show HN: Oodle – serverless, fully-managed, drop-in replacement for Prometheus (38 points | 26 comments)
11. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (5 points | discuss)
12. Coding Font by Typogram – Find Your True Love of Coding Fonts (35 points | 24 comments)
13. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (59 points | 18 comments)
14. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (141 points | 66 comments)
15. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (451 points | 151 comments)
16. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (65 points | 55 comments)
17. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (52 points | 22 comments)
18. Show HN: An expression parser supporting multiple types (20 points | 4 comments)
19. Several people detained in Switzerland over death in a 'suicide capsule' (35 points | 24 comments)
20. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (496 points | 128 comments)
21. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (110 points | 21 comments)
22. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1370 points | 313 comments)
23. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (395 points | 81 comments)
24. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (207 points | 94 comments)
25. EzAudio: Enhancing Text-to-Audio Generation with Efficient Diffusion Transformer (59 points | 5 comments)
26. One Collatz Coincidence (46 points | 18 comments)
27. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (219 points | 53 comments)
28. Inside a Ferroelectric RAM Chip (122 points | 56 comments)
29. Blue Origin has ignited an orbital rocket stage (11 points | 1 comment)
30. Launch HN: Panora (YC S24) – Data Integration API for LLMs (77 points | 12 comments)
